about_the_game:
Take on the challenge as a space pilot in this adrenaline-fueled space shooter. Complete a variety of objectives, from attacking enemy forces to defending friendly ships. Blast your way through unique alien ships, space stations, bosses and defend your allies including miners, probes, and convoys against all odds.

Master various ships

Choose from a variety of unique ships, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. With multiple ships to pilot, you can explore the galaxy and engage in fast-paced combat in a new way each time. Take your battles to the next level by pursuing optional objectives. With each successful mission, boost your ship's weapons and defenses.

Unlock and upgrade weapons

Explore an arsenal of weapons to match your playstyle. With lasers, rockets, mines, and defensive turrets at your disposal, you'll never run out of options. As you make your way through the game, earn credits to unlock more weapons and upgrade your existing ones.

Build the docks and battleship

You can buy upgrades for your ships in the docks. Upgrades will enhance your ship's capabilities, including HP, primary weapons, dash rate, continual reload, attack or defense drones and more. Each upgrade will build or upgrade a structure within your docks. You can get additional upgrades by completing optional and special objectives. The docks central structure, your battleship, will slowly take shape, becoming stronger and more powerful. When you've earned enough upgrades, you'll unlock the special battleship levels!

Story

In a distant future, humanity's expansion leads to the discovery of mysterious jump gates created by an unknown civilization. But with this discovery comes a fateful encounter with alien forces, resulting in destruction of Earth and forcing the remnants of humanity to retreat to the edge of the galaxy. As one of the few skilled pilots in the Last Hope colony, it's up to you and few others in special forces to protect the colony against the alien forces that threaten humanity's existence. Strike against the alien threat, steal their resources, and research new technologies that will give humanity a fighting chance. Battle your way through enemy forces, complete critical objectives and sabotage their efforts to discover the colony.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Galaxy Highways

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Video RAM - GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Action space shooter where you undertake dangerous missions into enemy systems. Upgrade ships, weapons, destroy various enemies, space stations and withstand increasingly powerful enemy waves. Protect your miners, convoys and build the battleship to destroy even stronger enemies.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Slovak
*languages with full audio support
